kese wethath, wiwidha hethun matha, ape shariraye prathishakthikarana paddhathiya agnyashaye mema ‘insiyulin nipadawana saila’ walata erehiwa kriya kirimata patan ganima nisa, maranthika sankulatha athi kala haki, barapathala rogayak wana, ‘diyawadiyawa’ athiwimata hethu wenawa.
mata ahamben lak ef.em eke “dumbara padura” kiyana wadasatahana athare ahanna labune.
dinak adala welawata bas rathaya nopaminiyeya.
ewun nan ithin oone tharan innawane.
saudiye gruha sewayata giya labala yuwathiyak maruta: gela walalagena miyagiya bawata thorathuru
gugal sinhala pariwarthana sewaya ada sita kriyathmakayi
eya mulu lokayatama katha kala haki magak.
sesu rajya sewayan sambandhayenda danatamath kriyathmaka wanne ebandu karya pati patiyaki.
eka dawasak aaranchiyak aawa hora wodka bothal hayak enawa kiyala.
'yagnyawa' nam thibunath prashnayak naha.
adala kuda lipi walata yomu sama anu mathrukawakatama pahalin dakwa atha.

ejapaye (yahapalanaya da athulu) parana horu menma balaya labunahoth jawipe “wiya haki“ horu ganada apata awabodhayak athi namudu apage uthsahaya wuye apa hondin ma danna ewun palawa harima ya.apata waradi siduwiya haka.

eya pasugiya wasare agosthu masaya dakwa wu kalaya thula ipayu amerikanu dolar miliyana 1,095.4 ta sapekshawa me wasare ema kalaye di amerikanu dolar miliyana 1,447.2 k upaya ganimata samathwa thibe.wenath welenda sewa gala eem pasugiya 2013 wasare agosthu masaya dakwa amerikanu dolar miliyana 1,469.6 k wu athara eya siyayata 13.7 ka wardhanayak pennum karamin me wasare ema kalaye di amerikanu dolar miliyana 1,670.5ka agayak pennumkara atha.me athara shri lankawe aarthikaya shakthimath kirimehila imahath karyabharayak itukarana wideshagatha shri lankika shramikayange ipayima siyayata 10 ka wardhanayak pennum kara thibena athara eya pasugiya wasare mul masa ate di amerikanu dolar miliyana 4,105.6 k wu athara me wasare ema kalaye di amerikanu dolar miliyana 4,514.7 k wi thibe.eeta amatharawa shri lankawe parisaraya aayojana wenuwen hithakara thaththwayak thibena bawata pasak karamin wides sruju aayojanayanhi wardhanaya siyayata 54.8 ka agayak gena thibena bawada pasugiya wasare mul masa ate di amerikanu dolar miliyana 549.1 k labi thibena bawada shri lanka maha bankuwa kiya siti.
esema durekshayakin nirikshanaya karanawanam sudusu usakin yuth asunak nirikshana sthanayata ragena yama wadath sudusu ya.

ane manda bolaw goda kalekin blog eka liyannath bari una..samanyen mama blog eka liyanne sathiyakata sarayak.hethuwa mama sathiyata dawas 5 k inne kampas eke hostal eke wimayi.wenada sikurada hawasa thamayi aluth kathawak liyala blog eka apdet karanne.eeth ena sathiye indan eekatath badu hambu wenawa.senasuradath dawal wenakan thiyanawa hamadatama yuni eken awut wenakanma.ape yuni eke kramaya thamayi eeka..digatama pulu puluwan widihata aniwa liyan yannam...ane manda ...

si.wi. wigneshwaran niyojanaya karana demala janatha jathika sandhanaya saha gajendra kumar ponnambalam niyojanaya karana akila ilangeyi demala kongrasaya samanga ekwa katayuthu kirimata thama pakshaya kamaththa pala karana bawa demala jathika sandhanaya pawasanawa.
thawa karanayak thiyanawa oya kumanthrana kathawa boruwak wenta ba kiyala hithanta.
eekath karala balanna loku aasawak thiyenawa.
nawika hamudapathige mema kriya kalapaya nawika hamudawatama balawath apakirthiyak bawath, ohu gana parikshanayak pawathwena bawath aarakshaka amathyansha aaranchi kiyayi.
rata diyunu kala nohaki kalamanakarana karana
“reddak kiyawanna epa ayise..
aathal eka kawa magadi nawaththala.
ese namuth guru saha senasuru wakra wu wita ho rahu kethu akshaya 6 saha 12 wannata samipa wu wigasa siyalla aapita karakena bhumarangayak bawata pathweyi.
thawath kattiyak ethana namin hitiya.
puluwan tharam wela inna samanya widiyata husma ganna.
bora diye malu bana mage yaluwoth innawa.
potha gahuwath, praja sathkara kalath sathutu samagam pawathwuwath pradhana karanawa blog liwima.
rawita molayak na.
hithe thiyagena duk windinawata wadiya..."
eda wechchi me siduwima harunama.
ela kawi set eka...
man meka adayi kiyewwe godak aadambarayi oya gana, apita uganwapu samahara guruwaru kale oya karapu deta wiruddha de....
unwahanse samaja wichalyathawayanta oroththu dena paridi thaman wahansege jiwana charyawa pawathwagena aapu aakaraya, pilibandawath aduma washayen apata punchi adhyayanayak wath thibiya yuthuyi.
kalekata passe gahayata bankuwata wela tikak sanasille uda balagena hitiya.
me mama dakapu dewani charithe..
bachata danaganna labunu widihatanan awurudu ganak thisse aanduwa yata gahapu watup prashnaye uchchathama awasthawayi arbudayak widihata pupura giye.
ehidi madhyawedin wimasu prashna hamuwe thawa duratath adahas dakwu hitapu amathyawaraya meseda pawasiya.
sarath fonseka nam charithaya uda damagena wirayek karana wita okkoma buruwo hitiye ee uda damana thana ya.
mehemayi, wasara wisihathaka kshethragatha palapuruddak thibena nisa ma ugath deyak thibenawa.
ema akusal nisa maranin mathu thirisan lokaye ipadunahama ema thirisan sathawa ikmanatama sharira bara wadi karala masata ganna kramaya kiyala denneth awidya sahagatha sithamayi.

shri lanka adhikarana amathyanshaya anumathiya lath diwurum dun bhasha pariwarthaka saha mulu diwayinatama samadana winishchayakaru / wishramika guwan niyamu / shri lanka adhyayakshaka sangamaye samajika
wayis sha pandu 34ka di nodawi lakunu 74k labagaththa.
bibisi sinhala samaja madhya jala osse
hitapu hamuda anadena niladhariyaku wu mohu thaliban palanaya binda watimen pasuwa afgan aarakshaka amathiwaraya lesa katayuthu kaleya.
dan palath sabha chandayen eyala 13% ta bahalath mole padune nathnam eelangata 3% ta bassama gedarama gihin thawi thawi….
ow eeka doratuwak!!!
